membershipLevels.name: Non-Profit Membership
membershipLevels.description: A discounted membership tier for verified non-profit organizations focused on community service and outreach.
benefits: Discounted rates for workshops and training
Ability to submit community events for the Chamber calendar

membershipLevels.name: Bronze Membership
membershipLevels.description: Entry-level membership designed for small businesses and startups seeking visibility and foundational Chamber benefits.
benefits: Standard business directory listing with contact information

membershipLevels.name: Silver Membership
membershipLevels.description: A mid-level membership offering expanded visibility, advertising opportunities, and additional event access.
benefits: Featured business directory listing with logo and priority placement
Access to business development and leadership workshops
Discounts on Chamber advertising and sponsored placements

membershipLevels.name: Gold Membership
membershipLevels.description: The premium membership tier granting maximum visibility, influence, and exclusive access to Chamber leadership opportunities.
benefits: Free booth at the annual business expo
Priority speaking opportunities at Chamber events
Feature article in the Chamber newsletter
Access to executive roundtables and leadership meetings
